title: Low fat carbonara sauce
ingredients: ['1 small onion, finely chopped', '1 garlic clove, finely chopped', '2 tablespoons vegetable stock', '57g lean bacon', '1 tablespoon quark or fromage frais', '2 eggs', '1 tablespoon Parmesan cheese, grated', '2 tablespoons fresh parsley, chopped', 'salt and pepper to taste', '120g pasta']
